content.body: Ian Hickson: there's something wrong with TLS, the hixie.ch certificate is only valid for www.hixie.ch or some such (it seems that directly visiting hixie.ch somehow doesn't cause that issue, not sure what's up with that)

content.body: As far as I remember Chrome has some special case for www and accepting certs without it
